LanguageData.YourPawnGainProjectileInversionTraitMsg: {0} gained the trait : {1}! They can rebound projectiles now!
LanguageData.ProjectileInversionSettingSpeedDesc: You can't rebound the projectile if the speed of the projectile exceed this value.(default:200)
LanguageData.ProjectileInversionSettingShowTextDesc: If true,it will throw a text mote when you rebound projectile.(default:true)
LanguageData.ProjectileInversionSettingNoReboundDesc: If true, will just block damage, not rebound the projectile.(default:false)
LanguageData.ProjectileInversionSettingAutoTraitDesc: Pawns will get the rebound-trait automatically when reaching level 20 in melee skill or level defined here
LanguageData.ProjectileInversionSettingLevelToTrigger: The skill-level that pawns should get the trait. Can be set to higher than 20 if a supported mod is loaded.
LanguageData.ProjectileInversionSettingUncapManipulat: Normally a manipulation calculations are caped at 100%, enable this setting to ignore this.
